name: It's Reunions. Can You Finally Hook Up With Your Old Crush?
name_original: It's Reunions. Can You Finally Hook Up With Your Old Crush?
description:
(IMPORTANT: May not work in Webkit-based browsers such as Safari and Chrome. )

You’re finally back at Reunions, and it’s time to answer a question that’s hung over your head for years: Can you finally hook up with your old crush?

Three full days of Reunions action. 19 different endings to collect. All sorts of hijinks to get up to. 

Become a god of dance. Turn into a human battering ram. Get lectured about Maseratis. Re-enact the ending of Akira. And maybe, just maybe, actually get with your crush. 

Featuring additional art by Caden Ohlwiler '15, aka Turbulent Determinism.

For a list of further image credits, click here.
